name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Epoch: Make Today Count New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab Chrome Extension that tracks how much time has passed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A minimal new tab replacement that shows you how much of the year has passed every time you open a new tab. 

It is a great way to stay motivated and mindful of time passing.
